// helpers are not located in components, they are moved to a higher level
export const preloadImage=src=>{return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const img=new Image();img.src=src;img.onload=resolve;img.onerror=reject;});};export const preloadImages=imagesArray=>{const promises=imagesArray.map(src=>preloadImage(src));return Promise.all(promises);};
